headline: Johnson Controls prices senior notes offering
summary: Johnson Controls International plc (NYSE: JCI) (the "Company" or "Johnson Controls"), a global leader for smart, healthy and sustainable buildings, today announced the pricing of its offering of €500 million senior notes due 2033. The net proceeds will be used for general corporate purposes, including the repayment, redemption or refinancing of outstanding commercial paper and other near-term indebtedness. headline: Why Shares of Johnson Controls Surged Again in November
summary: Heating, ventilation, air conditioning (HVAC), and building controls company Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI) rose by 11% in November, according to data from S&P Global Market Intelligence.  The catalyst for the move comes from the company's fourth-quarter earnings report, released early in the month.  Not only did fourth-quarter revenue and earnings come in ahead of guidance, but the company's orders and building solutions backlog growth also set up Johnson Controls for another strong year.
